root.item: You should consider doing a key update when your site is compromised to avoid hackers cracking the UC_KEY key with a known UC_MYKEY key.

item.item: Before operation, it is recommended that you choose to operate during off-peak hours or temporarily close down-linked websites, and do a good job of backing up the data and files of UCenter and each application.
I have understood the above risks and have done a good job of backing up the website.
